description: Anger over a court's near-total ban continues as the ruling party says there is no turning back.
title: Poland abortion ruling sparks 'women's strike'
title_page: Poland abortion ruling sparks 'women's strike' - BBC News
maintext: He added: "The freedom of choice truly is a fundamental thing but we should all agree that in order to have this freedom of choice, one needs to be alive. The one who is dead cannot implement one's right of freedom of choice."
